find.title: Account recovery
find.pageInfo: Use recovery information saved in account details to recover your account.

EmailFindText.after: Found the following registered email address. Only first 4 letters shown due to privacy.
EmailFindText.before: Use one of the methods to verify your registered email address to continue.

done.title: Password changed
done.message: Password changed. Log in again using your new password.

error.title: Failed to reset password
error.multiple: You cannot use previously used passwords to reset.
error.etc: Failed to reset password. Please try again later.

find.number: Use registered phone number to recover registered email.
find.feedbackInfo: Verification code was sent to an email address you used to register.

authText.after: Resetting your password. Log in again using your new password.

authInput.placeholder: Enter verification code that was sent to your email.
authInput.rule: Enter a password between 8 and 20 characters by combining uppercase/lowercase letters numbers and special characters (.!@#$%).

notSync.title: Entered details do not appear to be valid
notSync.message: Information entered does not match our records

etc.title: Failed to send account details.
etc.message: Failed to send account details. Please try it later.

send.title: Verification code was sent
send.message: Verification code was sent to the email address you registered with. Check the verification code from your email.

error.sendMessage: Entered verification code does not match please try again
error.authMessage: Failed to verify please try again later
error.nobody: Information entered does not match our records
error.rulePassMessage: Password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Password needs to include at least 4 of following character types. - Uppercase letter - Lowercase letter- Number - Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ). Password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.
error.timeOut: Due to security reasons the verification code can only be sent again after 1 minute has passed. Check your email or try again some time later.
error.etc: Failed to send a verification code to your email please try again later.
